doc.title: Bat Masterson

credit.role: Tom Noble, Justice of the Peace
Henchman about to be Sawn in Half
Imposter in plaid shirt & light hat

doc.plot: Dressed-up dandy (derby and cane), gambler and lawman roams the West charming women and defending the unjustly accused. His primary weapon was his wit (and cane) rather than his gun.
